price: 22. Ir iš tiesų, Mes padarėme Koraną lengvą suprasti ir atsiminti. Ar atsiras tada tas, kuris prisimena (arba priima pamoką)?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
